title: Nekter Cleanse

cleaned_text: Power 40 is not a cleanse, but a carefully curated system of over 40 scientifically-backed vitamins, nutrients, and superfoods packed into six shot-sized bottles. Each shot can be enjoyed alone, but when taken as a system they are designed to boost your body when and where it needs it most. You can use Power 40 as a daily or weekly supplement, or whenever you feel you might need an extra boost. Why Power 40? The SAD (Standard American Diet) does not provide an adequate amount of essential vitamins and nutrients, and over time these deficiencies can lead to many health issues. Power 40 is designed to work with any lifestyle to give you what you need, when you need it, and to help you feel your best! Looking for a traditional juice cleanse? Kickstart healthier eating habits with our New Classic Detox Cleanse - an all-star lineup of beginner-friendly, purifying formulas. The New Nékter Classic Detox Cleanse is designed to help you ditch sugar cravings and increase your appetite for whole foods. Now featuring Turmeric, Celery Juice, Camu Camu, Butterfly Pea Flower, Prebiotics and Probiotics to provide you extra support as you sip your way to a new you! New to cleansing? Say hello to Celery Detox - your new daily ritual with the latest, easiest way to detox and restore your body's natural balance and glow. Our new 6-Day Celery Detox is the perfect supplement to any lifestyle or diet. Simply drink one bottle every morning for six days, and continue with your normal diet to give your digestion an effortlessly effective boost! Choose from 6-Day or 12-Day! For those new to cleansing and for seasoned "fasters" alike, our Half Day Fast includes four juices chock-full of nutritious fruits and vegetables to help you "cleanse to dinner" or to gently re-boot your system. Featuring our famous Celery Detox as well as 3 brand new flavors: Lite Greens, Dragon Fruit Skinny Lemonade, and Chocolate Superfood Protein! Whether you choose the Celery Detox or the Classic Detox Cleanse you're well on your way to restoring your body's natural
